Name: Under The Clouds
Ingredients: 40 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: “The inspiration for my cocktail is an Estonian woman. Her beauty, her nature and her spark all of which I've tried to bring out in my cocktail. Terviseks!”
History: Estonian BACARDÍ Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Angelika Larkina, Estonian Bartenders Association Training Center Manager, Estonia.
Garnish: Grapefruit, bear grass, sweet potato & white radish
